lenders.name: Uffe
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gör det möjligt.

lenders.name: CRAIG
lenders.loan_because: I know that this type of personal lending works to make individuals independent. Once independent, anything can happen. I cannot fix the world, but perhaps someone I help will. One person at a time is now my mantra.
lenders.occupational_info: I no longer work every day. Before retirement I was in banking and law. I continue to help in my community by reading to school children and helping low paid wage earners understand finances.

lenders.name: Niclas
lenders.loan_because: Because I can! I think equality is important, therefore I only lend money to women
lenders.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries and illness

lenders.name: III AD
lenders.loan_because:
We feel fortunate to be able to work in a field that sustains us economically and creatively.  We loan/give because we believe in the global community and want to do what we can to foster its growth.  
Rain feeds your garden one drop at a time, let it pour.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a smalll design/build company dedicated to inspired/thoughtful work, carefully crafted and based on green building principles.

lenders.name: Karl-Johan
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to recieve funding for my own ventures and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell things on the Internet

lenders.name: Frank and Leslie
lenders.loan_because: ?? Isn't that the right thing to do?
lenders.occupational_info:
Frank teaches  people how to manage emergencies.

Leslie works at home

lenders.name: Håkan
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Lena
lenders.loan_because: Because I want and can, it’s as simple as that.

lenders.name: rolle
lenders.loan_because: I belive that to give loans like this is a very good way to make people help themselfs.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive train, truck and bus in Stockholm and I am also active as a peacekeeping soldier. Have been serving in the ME , Kosovo and recently Tchad

lenders.name: Freelanzer
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to see the money get to good use. There is great strife in the world today and we must commit ourselves to in unity end this and let humankind arise to a new dawn with no poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a Tropical-house or Zoo with two others. We have reptiles, insects and spiders on display for the public so they may learn more of the diversity in this world.

lenders.name: Alma
lenders.loan_because: Compassion for humanity and an ability to provide capital where major lending institutions have failed the developing economies.  Kiva has blessed us with being able to fill this gap.  People need opportunities to grow their businesses and hopefully build and contribute to their communities.

lenders.name: Bengt
lenders.loan_because: I am glad for the opportunity to help.

lenders.name: Lisen
lenders.loan_because: I want to give honest people who struggle the opportunity to help themselves to a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: I restore antiquities.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity for others is important.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others reach financial freedom.

lenders.name: Stig
lenders.loan_because: I have an income that make it possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working with computers

lenders.name: Cybil
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this idea in swedish Tv, and I find it great! I love to be a Kiva-lender. We who have much can help.
lenders.occupational_info: Take care of my family and all people that want my help.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving people access to capital, normally denied to them, can improve their lives and the lives of their families and people in their communities

lenders.name: Rod & Sheila
lenders.loan_because: We have been to desperately poor countries and have come to realize that part of the reason we are blessed, is so we can be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Sheila teaches English in her home and Rod operates heavy equipment for Highland Valley Copper near Kamloops, BC.

lenders.name: Kristan
lenders.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to leave this world a little better than we found it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing a Master of Social Work degree.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: Microlending -- and people helping people -- makes a lot of sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I help employees understand and support my corporation's goals.

lenders.name: gunilla
lenders.loan_because: I used to live in Bolivia.  Once had a son from there. Feel part of the people there.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with refugees in my country, teaching them Swedish, to enable them to live here.

lenders.name: Cheryl & Dennis
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Luong
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Rebekah  Brandvold
lenders.loan_because: it is exciting to be part of new homes, industries and businesses that people are creating.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Together, we can make difference.

lenders.name: Bob & Cindy
lenders.loan_because: We have a wonderfully blessed life and like to see others work hard, follow dreams and prosper.

lenders.name: Jen Dudley
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help those who want to make their family's lives better.  You gotta share the wealth!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Business Development Manager

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: mighty oaks grow from small seeds.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes books for children.

lenders.name: Cinquex
lenders.loan_because: The world's superpowers' quest for a New World Order and Hegemony must be challenged by all means necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: A job is just a means to an end.  It does not define who you are.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two young children.

lenders.name: Allen Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family wants to do what we can to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I know much can be done with a little help at the right time in the right place

lenders.name: Mitch
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with university students every day helping them to see that the true quality of their lives is dependent on how they utilize and share their resources.

lenders.name: SAS-75
lenders.whereabouts: Deep in the heart of Texas
lenders.loan_because: it feels good inside.  I'm sure you feel the same way.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: I want to be invloved with people on a global level.  I want to be involved in other cultures and peoples that are different than my own to help them grow as a business person as I grow as a human being.

lenders.name: Rohan
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do to help my fellow man.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the intake and distribution of documents between the owner, contractors, architect and the project manager of the construction project for which I am the office engineer. Additionally, I am responsible for compiling a monthly report for the owner which captures the relevant data-sets for the project in question.

lenders.name: Trevor & Aimee & Zeke
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly, our work is to teach and to play.

lenders.name: Laura John Julia Aimee
lenders.loan_because: It's really, really important.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, human resources executive, students

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I wish to feel a part of the whole world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clean, temperature control laboratory hoping to unlock understanding of the process of disease that can then be applied to help others.  I am blessed by this opportunity and understand that many others must toil under difficult conditions and circumstances everyday to make their ends meet.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Lisa
lenders.occupation: Jon: database programmer, Lisa:  stay at home mom
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Jon is a database programmer. Lisa is staying home to take care of our sons, Elliott and Oliver.

lenders.name: Winston
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is always the answer, but Compassion is always my motivation.
lenders.occupational_info: I make delicious things to eat for hospital patients and staff.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: i've seen it in action

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: My education was funded largely by generosity of others who provided loans and donations.  Since I can't afford to give much to charity I decided that loaning would be the best way for me to help others with my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research in mathematics in order to hopefully become a math professor at a university.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because:
I want to support the way of life in other countries, so that every child and parent
can decide over thier life and future  for them selves.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Success for the little guy (or gal) is success for me.  I lend for entirely selfish reasons; that is, their achievement helps me.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It will make a difference in the lives of those that receive the loans. That seems so much better than spending the money for dinner at a fancy restaurant.
lenders.occupational_info: I drove a cement truck for 39 years in San Francisco, California, U.S. Carrying concrete for houses, tall buildings, bridges, and roads. I'm retired now and enjoying the rest.     Good Luck.

lenders.name: elaine
lenders.loan_because: I want to raised my mini sari-sari store that is why i needed $1,000. payable in 12 months. I have a small store, I sell candies,cigarettes, I make snacks,juices and softdrinks, before I used to have an eatery with the same place but due to the lack of capital, I ended up selling candies, cookies,and cigarettes. but for what I am selling is not enough to cover the rental fee thats why I have to expand and renovate my place so that it will be attracted to the customers as well. I want to be successful in my business so that I may retire earlier and have more time to spend with my family. hope you can help me
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small business and i am also an employee, of a designing firm. married with one baby boy ( 4 months old). I dont quit unless i see my business is already stable.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because:
It is so little money to me but it can mean so much to someone else. It's the least I can do and I think by helping someone build their own business, you are actually helping the whole community, not just one person. 

Also, I grew up quite poor by American standards, and I understand the impact that hope can have. All it takes is a few people to believe in you and it can make all the difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a journalism student with a concentration in environmental reporting. I hope to graduate sometime next year, and I'm kicking around the idea of applying to law schools after that.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to become financially independent and credit with a reasonable interest rate is key.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I think it important that women around the world find their self-worth through entrepreneurship. A society is only as good as the strength and stability of its women.
lenders.occupational_info: University Professor

lenders.name: Colette
lenders.loan_because: It is sheer luck that I happened to have been born in a country of wealth and privilege and because I believe that money is unequally (and unjustly) distributed in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I digitize books.

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.loan_because: I love the efficient, internet based system and the idea of helping entrepreneurs in very small businesses . This way I will be able to help many people  using the same Dollar again and again  over the years. And I will certainly  reinvest and increase the lending total on every occasion. I congratulate the KIVA team for this splendid idea. It makes a lot more sense than an anonymus donation from one government to the other.

lenders.name: Blixen
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want that workers could skip the banks that instead of generate wellness generates more poor people.....
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop software

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I always had to help myself. With Kiva I can help others to help themselves too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a typical businessman, closing multi billion $ deals in the IT industry. But my origins are in poverty and I am still close to earth. I want everyone to be happy with their work, feeling special and proud.

lenders.name: Ninna
lenders.loan_because: It´s a good way to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Désirée
lenders.occupation: Software developer and mother of two kids
lenders.loan_because: I have what I want, others don't. Shared happiness is twice as much happiness.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.occupational_info: Playing classical music.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupation: foot reflex therapy, chiropody, teacher chiropody

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: i have a reasonably good and healthy life and want to give back to someone less fortunate than me that has the inspiration but not the money to make a different to their own life or the lives of their family members.
lenders.occupational_info: i care.  because you do.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: kiva makes it possible to do so in a sensible way
lenders.occupational_info: my work involves lending money locally

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
Dear Administrator,
                           Kindly permits me some space in your most high esteem to know my opinion of searching for the NGO'S ON THE NET. I am subsistence farmer who is in need of loan, to help to empower my production. And create employment for my locality, and alleviate myself and my people from poverty. So I would like you to help me out of this or liberate us from poverty. All the best.
                                                                        
                                                                 Thanks
                                                                 Michael Elkan.
lenders.occupational_info:
Dear/madam
                         I had completed agricultural secondary school and did not get financial support to  continues  my educaation, so I choose to start a small scale farming business where I am seeking for NGO's support to loan me to help empower the production. Thanks

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I can. Also want to support anyone who is trying to make a postive difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I report on Television and help people to talk to the media and in front of groups.

lenders.name: jschenk
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Clinton
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a great way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: aspiring attorney.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: What better way is there to feel that you can actually make a difference? It can be frustrating to watch the news and feel powerless to do anything about all of the suffering that goes on in the world. Lending is an empowering act.

lenders.name: Linn and Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Bill taught English for many years. Linn teaches elementary age children after school

lenders.name: Murray
lenders.loan_because: small amounts of money can make such phenomenal improvements in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people manage their money so that they can make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupation: Financial consultant to start up businesses
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the life and teaching of Jesus Christ to help those in need.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I wish all people could have the same opportunities I've had.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together! I enjoy the feeling of connection that making a Kiva loan offers.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a good idea

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: i feel it is not my merit to be born in a more wealthy country, and thus i schould share what i have
lenders.occupational_info: i work in an office, an hour way awy from my home, and write programs (together with a small team of collegues) of all kinds, mostly things to do administration, for a medium-sized company (about 1000 employees).

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest businesses have a tremendous impact.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.loan_because: I think it´s the best way to help, giving people the means to help themselves..

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepeneur myself and   want to help other women help their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I do the labor for housecleaning and have kept my kids employed when they needed work.

lenders.name: CathyJean
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to suceed
lenders.occupational_info: I am a visual artist who specializes in works on paper, printmaking

lenders.name: Gabriella
lenders.loan_because:
Why not?!

 I firmly believe that, "to whom much has been given, much will be expected."
Since there is such an inequality in the distribution of the world's resources, we must do our part to even the playing field.
I subscribe to the mentality that we can "help others to help themselves."  
The world will never be perfect, but each of us has the power to make it a better place. We are all human beings, after all.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student in Stockholm University.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I love business and because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit employees to work for my employer and I help retain those employees by maintaining a work environment that is fun and supportive.

lenders.name: Kyle & Carol
lenders.loan_because: Share my good fortune and help others.

lenders.name: Inga B.
lenders.loan_because: Surplus money, even small amounts, should work.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people  have a better life.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I wait tables in a local restaurant that serves Italian food. While I'm not working in the restaurant, I work in a glass studio, making jewelry, plates, and stained glass windows.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Access to credit is the first step towards creating economically viable businesses. These businesses can then help transform the communities they serve. In the end, everyone benefits as the rising tide lifts all ships!
lenders.occupational_info: David is a high school physics teacher.

lenders.name: Thor
lenders.loan_because: Even though I live on a limited income, I still have some capability to help others that are serious about their business.  I strongly believe that as long as I am capable of helping others achieve their goals, then it is my responsibility to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work.  I am considered disabled.

lenders.name: Olle
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people to improve their life and hopefully make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Install and repair network equipment.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give everyone an opportunity to improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: College student at Georgetown University.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help others.

lenders.name: Apryl
lenders.loan_because: we are all one and life is meant to be joyful.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is teaching people to connect with divinity and to bring that same divinity out in them selves.  I believe we all have something wonderful to express.  I choose to express through writing, sculpture (www.aprylian.com), and web sites.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: These people want the same for their children as we do for ours. If the small amount I loan can help grow their business, turn a profit, feed, clothe, and educate their children...what's the problem? No Starbucks this week....Oh well!

lenders.name: mel
lenders.loan_because: The best business people are in the poorest countries - i know this will work
lenders.occupational_info: Internet Sales

lenders.name: Sven
lenders.occupation: Museum curator at Fotevikens Museum, Sweden.

lenders.name: Kyle A
lenders.loan_because: Because I want other people to feel better.
lenders.occupational_info: 6th grader!!!

lenders.name: Mac
lenders.loan_because: So they may be able to sculpture part of their life.
lenders.occupational_info: Bring within the reach of many the art I rediscovered in God's creation.

lenders.name: David Mariner
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to build a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working at The DC Center, a gay, lesbian, bi & trans community center in Washington DC.

lenders.name: Seattle ML Club
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of friends, based in Seattle, WA, who are interested in making a difference in developing nations through the act of micro lending.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just forming our club and will update this profile once we have our first meeting and pool together our first round of funding.

lenders.name: Marie & Philippe
lenders.occupation: Happy mother (4 children) and Postal Services.
lenders.loan_because: We sponsor two little girls in Ethiopia thanks to World Vision and what they give us in return is indescribable ! Sharing is the only solution for a "better world".
lenders.occupational_info:
We take part in the network computing project malariacontrol.net.
More info: http://malariacontrol.net

lenders.name: LeAnthony
lenders.loan_because: What makes life worth living if you can not help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Help the sick get better.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help other to help themselves.

lenders.name: Ramona
lenders.loan_because: I'm a lucky bastard... or I believe that people can make there own future. We just need a helping hand sometimes.  I'm glad to come along for the ride...

lenders.name: Eva Engström
lenders.loan_because: I can help others to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a highly specialized intensive care unit in Sweden. I have also worked in many other places around the world.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I loan because some people are very poor, and I want to help them.  I'm glad I can help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work really hard as a student.  I am nine years old.  My birthday was just yesterday, July 15, 2008.  AND I  WAS BOrn in 1999.  I am a tutor at the public library, and I teach a little girl from Mexico that is five years old and works real hard.

lenders.name: Ola
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help somebody

lenders.name: SMALLS
lenders.loan_because: Cowboy Dogs are interested in loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers

lenders.name: J. R.
lenders.loan_because: I am happy, healthy, and I can.  Shouldn't you?
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the motion picture industry in California.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: we are called to help and support others in need.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Practice what you believe.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies create new data products to serve the construction and industrial industries.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.occupational_info: I am dental student. I am learning how to take care of people's teeth.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: it is a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wood and paper scientist who also teaches calculus to students in resource management programs

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: David and Janine
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: We're never going to be rich, but we love what we do and can't imagine doing anything else.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: If we all share a little, it will make a huge difference in the lives of others and the world!

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and I know that these loans do make a difference!

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have the same advantages that I was lucky enough to have.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a junior doctor (internal medicine resident) working at a university hospital.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone a hand up rather than a handout.  A hand up communicates respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency within USDA which provides 40 different loan and grant programs that supports rural communities and low income families.

lenders.name: Andrea & Andy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance...

lenders.name: Tracy Jane
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing is an excellent way to create sustainable and ethical economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying music therapy.  I work in a hospital in the children's physical rehabilitation unit using music to assist their medical and psychological needs.

lenders.name: patrice
lenders.loan_because: Financial resources need to be made available to individuals, families, and communities that are denied access to basic funds.  When social, cultural, political, or envirionmental conditions block opportunities for people to work and build a  life, the chasm of separateness gets bigger and our global community weakens.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses to motivate them to consistantly consider the well being of people and the planet as they make decisions toward building profit.

lenders.name: Werner
lenders.loan_because: I am in the very lucky position that I can.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that in some small way I'm helping someone who has not been as fortunate as I have been.  I truly believe that these small loans can make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: the idea of someone willing to help themselves deserves respect and support.  If all someone needs is a little capital to get started as an entrepreneur then they should be helped.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in business development for an Austin based renewal energy company.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help some one less fortunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Very Busy,working with patients that need glasses,or contacts,and helping the Dr.assist them for all their eye health -needs.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is great to be a part of helping give someone else a chance to make their life better.  Thanks Kiva!

lenders.name: Shanna
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected and responsible for and to each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make the world a better place by advocating peace and justice.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!  Giving others the ability to create their dreams too is very important.
lenders.occupational_info: Sort of between jobs - I am leaving doing office work, training to be a massage therapist, as well as a mosaic artist!

lenders.name: Jarmen & Ben
lenders.loan_because: I should, if I can!

lenders.name: lai
lenders.loan_because:
I am a lovely girl from China. I owns a small shop selling chinese food and household items. I want to expand the area of my 

store and open my new business if i could lend some money. I works very hard from 8am until 23pm everyday.
lenders.occupational_info: I am applying for my first loan with Kiva. I am able to improve the appearance of my store and invest in products that increased profits and business.  It is hard living as a single girl, but i has no desire to persuade my family and move to a bigger place. Now I needs a loan of $1000 to expand the area of my old store.

lenders.name: Anja
lenders.loan_because: I believe that is a sufficient way to support people in getting more independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working for the world largest transport and logistics company as a senior consultant. My main task is to secure intellectual property in any of 220 countries and territories we cover.

lenders.name: Vesa
lenders.loan_because: It has newer been this easy to change the world. Plus, it's a loan that encourages entrepreneurship and empowerment, instead of a donation that doesn't encourage much anything.

lenders.name: rasheed
lenders.loan_because: i really love to increase the rate of my trading business.i have plantation of cocoa land.
lenders.occupational_info: am a agricultural farmer ,likewise a food trader.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I loan money because I find it fulfilling to give people a chance to get the opportunity to lend money where regular bank loans does not apply.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work as  project coordinator I help attending in three different project aiming to attract investments to Sweden.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it's a good idea

lenders.name: christine
lenders.occupation: I am a environmental education teacher.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Empowerment is key.

lenders.name: Brigid
lenders.loan_because: I may not have much money, but I have enough to help others.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I realize others need it more than I do.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurship can go a long way.

lenders.name: Peter & Meghan
lenders.loan_because: Every human deserves the opportunity to live out their full potential as creative and dignified individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying socio-economic development from the perspectives of political science and economics.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: There is an intrinsic desire for people to want to help themselves and not recieve a handout.  Pride and appreciation comes from looking at the fruits of your labor, not the dependance on others.
lenders.occupational_info: We all come from the same source, thus you are my brothers and sisters.  Would you hesitate to help a family member?

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.name: Lauren

lenders.name: Amorn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy doing it.

lenders.name: Jay

lenders.occupational_info: I work in advertising.

lenders.name: Volunteer
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer Organization

lenders.name: Ola & Linnea

lenders.occupational_info: Former woodtechnician consult and journalist

lenders.name: Freyja
lenders.loan_because: it's a great idea!  It's smart, helping people build businesses that will sustain them and their families and contribute to a healthy global economy.

lenders.name: cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great idea!

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: We all need to think globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women deliver healthy babies.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: because I want to help others accomplish their goals.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support themselves & their family.  I would like to help others because that's what Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Amory
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and i have visited many third world countries and it has really moved me to lend to them and make thier lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: The work of helping people, to any extent, is the greatest gift anyone can give. It can only be repaid by the warmth and contentment you feel from doing good.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a real estate brokerage, helping different departments work together efficiently.

lenders.name: ADJ
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves to get a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I find people in IT the job they want.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals

lenders.name: John & Jackie
lenders.loan_because: We have always been impressed by the impact that microlending can have. So when Kiva came along and gave us the opportunity to participate it seemed too good to be true.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I care and we're here to help each other
lenders.occupational_info: When we are all part of the solution, there won't be a problem.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It's a good feeling to be able to help others

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to come up with money when you are just starting out because not everyone has a good standing with finances.  I want to help others out there become financially independant to where they can afford to help someone else in the same situations as what they were once in.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with all sorts of different families that want to buy a home but can't qualify due to many different situations that they are faced with. I buy houses and either fix them up and sell them to people on contract or rent to own basis that don't have large sums of money for downpayments or I sell them to other investors that have the financial means to fix up the properties in low income areas to make the communities a better, safer place to live.

lenders.name: Davinder
lenders.loan_because: I can and we all should!
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies manage their money and ensure that it is spent responsibly!

lenders.name: Grant

Kiva makes it so easy to do.  
I believe everyone should help everyone...

lenders.name: Landon
lenders.loan_because: I myself have received an enormous amount of help in my life, so I would like to help other people, too.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start home businesses.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: when a person has enough to meet their needs they should share

lenders.name: Cece
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to make the quality of someone else's life better.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I belive in helping women so that they can educate their children and raise themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: Give someone fish and you feed them for a day - Give a fishing net and you feed them for life - Loan them enough capital to start a fishing net manufacturing business, and you might create the chance for an entire community to prosper.

lenders.name: Teguh
lenders.loan_because: to help refugees in Bitung, North Celebes, Indonesia especially in fisheries,agricultrure and home industry sector
lenders.occupational_info: Training them to have entrepreuneur minded and make them more productive, so they can have a better life

lenders.name: Cait
lenders.occupational_info: I do computer work for a nongovernmental organization.

lenders.name: Ann and Fintan
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of helping one person at a time achieve specific goals and better his or her life and the surrounding community.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: it's a small thing I can do that makes a tremendous difference to someone on the other side of the world that I'll never meet. I also loan because my partner grew up in difficult circumstances in a Third World Country and it's a way of giving back.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Free enterprise works and everyone should have a fair chance to make it so.

lenders.name: Regular Kinda Guy

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist minority women to break the cycle of poverty and help them make a positive change in their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I style and stage homes so they become show ready and home buyers can move in mentally and therefore make an offer. A staged home generally sell faster and potentially for more. For more info and to see before and after photos of my staging & redesigns, go to www.staged4more.com

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to help people better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an airline and work with the pilots to plan and prepare for their flights.

lenders.name: Elaina
lenders.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to give back.

lenders.name: Blair and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We are His beloved!
lenders.occupational_info: Save and earn on energy bills.

lenders.name: Vincenzo
lenders.loan_because: we can defeat the poverty around the world with just one click.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others to buy their dream home and helping them shopping for the loan that fits their needs.

lenders.name: McKell
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Moa
lenders.loan_because: we are all one

lenders.name: Emma

lenders.name: sofia
lenders.loan_because: since i am totally blind myself, and often need help from others, i was happy to find a way of helping my self
lenders.occupational_info: music is a way of communicating that works for everybody. The people that i meet as a music therapist have big learning dissabilities and can't use spoken words, but they still have a lot to say and they need to say it. music is good for body and soul and can make you laugh and cry.

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.loan_because:
Two serious students of Krishnamurti's teachings are looking for other
 people who would like to join the venture of creating a Krishnamurti

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it give others the opportunity to build their businesses which in turn builds their confidence and their happiness. It also makes me feel good. It makes the world a better place to live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly big planes across big oceans!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people. I was a VSO volunteer and did a similar thing on a personal basis when I was working in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in a local primary school in Hong Kong.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I love loaning again and again being able to help people all over the world. We are one people, one planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare material for print before it goes to press. We do posters, booklets, brochures, business cards, etc. The company I work for (Westcare) is a non-profit organisation that provides work and accommodation services for disabled people.

lenders.name: Sherma
lenders.loan_because:
I admire the courage it takes to start and run one's own business.  "If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astonish ourselves."  - Thomas A. Edison
PURPOSE: If I can help somebody, my living will not be in vain.

lenders.name: Lawrence & Family
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach economics - how to think and reason about buying, selling, and other market activities.

lenders.name: Dayngr
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help empower people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses market their business to prospects through social media.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I just feel that this is the best way to suport a family or a person ,buddha says give to be given
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chef by passion enjoy beeng in asia which is my home now .I share my passion and eductaion by teaching a craft

lenders.name: Taryn & Sam
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Emina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: antonio
lenders.loan_because: I care about poor people
lenders.occupational_info: As any other hard working Job

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: Empowering women to be sulf-sufficient will change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a public arts conservatory for high school students.

lenders.name: Adamson family
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and out of that I want others to be blessed by what we have and what we can give.  I love this idea!!  It feels great to be doing something so concrete and meaningful and to know I'm helping someone not so different from myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom of 3 wonderful kids - Julia (3), Alex and Elijah (twins, 1).  I hope that the most important thing I do is to raise caring, compassionate, godly people.  I also teach math and science to 12 year olds.

lenders.name: Ed J.
lenders.loan_because: Backpacked around SE Asia for half a year, and saw lots of poverty and a poor perception of the USA. Since stereotypes break down on the individual level, I think the one to one micro-loans from real individuals in the USA to real individuals in other countries help relations.  A citizen of a country is automatically represented by their government on a macro scale, but Kiva gives an opportunity for citizens to represent the better side of themselves to each other one on one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Julie A.
lenders.loan_because: It's a win-win situation. I help someone and my doing so helps them, me and the world.

lenders.name: Jack & Lora
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist others in their goals to earn decent livings for their families. Kiva is a part of our ongoing charity commitment. As the LORD blesses us, we want to bless others with our resources.

lenders.name: Stéphanie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great initiative to help people directly.

lenders.name: Bill & Annette
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel good and we may very well be judged by how we treat those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach art to 1st and 2nd grade students.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: It sounded awesome, and then Jill reminded me about the site again :)

lenders.name: Indy Cat-O
lenders.loan_because: I am a crazy cat!

lenders.name: sierra
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I feel like the disparity between first world and third world countries is immoral.
lenders.occupational_info: A lab technician at Columbia University studying metacognition.  It's Amazing!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to feel as though I am a helpful member of the worldwide community.  If I can provide someone a chance to prosper through hard work with as little as a $25.00 loan, how can I say no?
lenders.occupational_info: I work on transportation systems and public transit projects.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because:
This is one great way to plug in to the global community.
It's the right place and the right time to do the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a really cool design/build company, IIIAD (also a Kiva lender) doing what I love, creating beautiful sustainable homes for the best  clients in the Twin Cities.

lenders.name: Terry & Will
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people help themselves.  We believe in the saying "Freely ye received, freely give."

lenders.name: maria

lenders.occupational_info:

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Kylie and Jesse
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are so fortunate in our lives, and love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to help themselves. We are all neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: I create one of a kind collages and paintings.

lenders.name: Sam

I like to see the less fortunate members of our world have a chance at realizing

lenders.loan_because: I've seen my host mama in Tanzania be able to send both her children to school and improve her home with the loan she received for her brick business.
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate student pursuing an MPA.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: My compassion is to help others.  I tell my friends all about Kiva and try to spread the word about this great organization.

lenders.name: Jim & LJ
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for the opportunities I have been given.   I want to to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I help small employers set up retirement plans.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to see a change in this world, even if it is only through one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for political campaigns.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have friends and family assist me in starting a business So i wanted to pass that along.
lenders.occupational_info: I restore and sell  old cars.

lenders.name: Will and Edna
lenders.loan_because: our dad believed in the Kiva model and was proud to support those who wanted to work to improve their lives. In honor of Mom who passed away 29 Sept. 2007 and Dad who passed away 12 Mar. 2008, we will continue their Kiva account and hope to help lift many others the way our parents worked to lift themselves.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people!!!!!  I have been very blessed and want to pass it  on!!!!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a swimming coach at Penn State University 

www.psu.edu 
www.gopsusports.com 


WE ARE.....PENN STATE

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: The amount I'm lending has no impact on my life, but can have a huge impact on someone else's.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Purchasing.  My company makes home theater projectors and displays, as well as other flat screen products.

lenders.name: Becca
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed.  I have food, clothing, shelter, wonderful family and friends.  I don't need to struggle to provide for my family the way some others may need to.  I loan because my little money may help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women in childbirth.

lenders.name: Kris&Nadia
lenders.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs get started can make the difference

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I love to help out and this is so easy!

lenders.name: Jenn, Claire and Dan
lenders.loan_because: i loan because to whom much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Zoey & Gracie
lenders.loan_because: We raise money every year on Canada Day, with a lemonade stand. This year we sold handmade bead jewelry too. With the money we made there and some matching donations (from some awesome relatives ) we wanted to help some other people in business for themselves. this year for my birthday instead of gifts i asked for donations to kiva on this request i received 110 dollars for kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: i am in grade 7

lenders.name: Tim and Anne
lenders.loan_because: To give someone else an opportunity.

lenders.name: DiamondJul
lenders.loan_because: it's fun and others deserve the same access to resources I have!  It is my way to pay forward the abundance I enjoy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional network marketer.  I work with people as a leader and trainer in this profession.  I help individuals and families create abundance of their own!

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: giving others the means to help themselves is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at rocks and soil, I assess their situation and how they behave e.g. landslides and subsidence.  I then design solutions to allow projects such as house building, railways and roads.  I would be happy to volunteer help to charities who may need my skills.

lenders.name: Farah
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student in California.

lenders.name: Matteo&Emma
lenders.loan_because: Because it' s concrete way to change the world and to help many people. We need to have the same possibilities wherever we born.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a financial analyst in M&A operations.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: to affect the quality of one's day is the highest of arts (thoreau).

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies advertise on major search engines.

lenders.name: misty
lenders.loan_because: I am able.

lenders.name: Tera
lenders.loan_because: Local economies are the key to a country's success. During our year+ round-the-world trip, my husband and I felt the power of small business on the "feel" of a country.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers and school leaders to help students be successful in mathematics.

lenders.name: Mike & Nay
lenders.loan_because: After watching a documentary about the work Kiva does My wife & I were really keen to get involved with helping others. We are looking forward to seeing many success stories.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of helping with money to build a business instead of just giving it away to a charitable whatever where I don't know what happens to it.
I hope my money will go around the world many times and help people start their businesses  and improve their lives and those of the generations that follow.
[Update] My plan seems to work and my money is helping lots of people again and again. VERY COOL THAT!
[Update] Already lent so much! How cool is that. I hope this is making some difference to someone.
[Update] For my 40th birthday I chose all presents to go to Kiva. Now I have a HELP CHEST with lots of $$ to do even more helping in the world!

Also bought a Yamaha TRX850 and love motorcycles so most of my lending is now towards people that use motorcycles or do transport stuff.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed IT contractor.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity...pay it forward.

lenders.name: Ulf
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in the lenders development
lenders.occupational_info: writing about the reality that beats hope

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: There are too many people suffering in this world and I want to help those in need.

lenders.name: AaronB
lenders.loan_because: I recognize that there is not a level playing field in the world and that I was born into a more advantageous position than many.  It is a small way for me to help give someone else an opportunity that they might not otherwise have.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: ... because I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and small companies with legal troubles, in the areas of the Internet, Intellectual Property (copyright, trademark, patents), and free speech.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: When I showed me Kiva I was so eager to create an account so my dad and I quickly created a Kiva account. Once we were done creating a Kiva account I quickly started loaning  people money. Now I check my account about every week to see if anyvody paid back so that I can loan more people money. GO KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: Well I mostly loan to people who are just starting so that they can have a fresh start. I also like to loan to people who are just about done. (for more information on my lending ways you can always send me a message) BYE!!!

lenders.name: Elizabeth and Billy
lenders.loan_because: We like the opportunity to give someone a chance to succeed and hopefully improve their communities.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: To participate in a small way  to help people who want a better life for themselves, their families and their neighbors. We all need a little help sometime in life. An opportunity to be a better global neighbor
lenders.occupational_info:
I  work for a company that provides medical equipment  primarily for the elderly,
My job is to work with caregivers  to see that patients get the proper equipment for their needs.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to have someone to help me start my own company. I want to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a marketing company. We design brochures and advertisements, and we produce large live events.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
The individuals requesting loans through Kiva are the personification of the entrepreneurial spirit that has made the United States the greatest nation in the world.  

I am glad to play a small role in helping others to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.whereabouts: Tai Kok Tsui Kowloon  Hong Kong
lenders.loan_because: through Kiva I am experiencing just how interconnected we are and how small the world really is.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher at a vocational college (post secondary school). I think that my students teach me, their teacher, more than I do them.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to help in their own community and succeed without paying too high a price.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel and meet many people like the people Kiva are helping, I enjoy my work and want to help others to enjoy their's.

lenders.name: Vivek & Bhavana
lenders.loan_because: Capialism  - The richest get loans at very low interest rates as their credit history is good and credit risk is very low. The poor on the other hand are the not eligible for loans, or are charged very high interest rates. This vicious cycle needs to be broken, and the more fortunate should break the system and let the less fortunate come out of the poverty trap. We should just think about the impact that our loans can have on each of the families that we try and support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working with a hedge fund as an analyst, mainly looking at asian equities.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to shape their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student, currently studying Arabic and international studies.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I meet people from many 3rd world countries at my job, they are very hard working brothers that just need  a chance.  I feel that sharing what you have can only help you.
lenders.occupational_info: NYC taxi garage--- work with many people from the same countries as people getting loans on this site.  I like to think that I could be helping a friend/relative of someone who works with me.

lenders.name: Nathan Moore
lenders.loan_because: I believe capitalism with good morals is the best path to a better world.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Sharing with others is a human need. It keeps us grounded with our neighbors around the world, and, hopefully, will leave the world a better place than we found it.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: Jesus calls us as imitators of Christ to aid the tired, weary, weak, and poor.  I give because He gave first.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop computer software that companies use to streamline business and save money.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I have been privileged enough to be going to the best school in the country and I have so many opportunities that others don't have, I would rather forgo a daily cup of coffee and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Africa and volunteer around the world when I can.

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have to start a project called Sahakaar for the 50 slum women to empower them through income generation activities and micro credits. This project will be self-supportive and after the repayment of Loan the profit will be used to start more Sahakaar groups. Instead of I waiting  for funds I would prefer to take loan and repay.
lenders.occupational_info: Sahakaar group is a group of 10 women working together taking micro credits and manufacture different products. These women are also provided education every day 1 hour after their work.

lenders.name: Donna & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We believe that it is the right thing to do - to help out others in need. It is such a small thing that can make such a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We live in a small town in Southern Saskatchewan, Canada. We have a moderate sized grain farm. Our family consists of 3 boys, 1 girl and 2 cats.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: i know this website from the tv, and it's really really useful that can help lots of people over the world.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Because it’s the least i can do

lenders.name: Larry & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: We are both self-employed and understand the challenges and benefits of starting and maintaining a small enterprise

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: To help others to be able to care for their families by making a living.  Making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide office support to others while caring for my 4 children (ages 11, 7, 5 and  20 months)

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Anything that could help a family  to live with dignity is worth helping.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a combination of system support, troubleshooting, logistics and planning. It is an overwhelming job actually.

lenders.name: Faruk
lenders.loan_because: Help children for education. Three most important things are essential to win against poverty - 1. Education 2. Education and 3. Education
lenders.occupational_info: IT Specialist

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand.

lenders.name: Deepak
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to raise a loan for such a high interest rate. It make me feel good to help who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Electrical Items distributor like Switchgear,Control gear products used in Electrical panels

lenders.name: David John
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit within a country with economic freedom can raise the world's standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: Comprehensive wealth management is based on the principle that small changes can have large effects over time.

lenders.name: kagoda
lenders.occupation: STUDENT WHO HAS TWO YEARS TO COMPLETE COURSE

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurial spirit and help those who are willing to work hard and take risks.
lenders.occupational_info: I helped men and women think through the process of starting and growing their own small business, how to plan, market, finance, maintain records, etc.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do. Helping someone to  enhance there life is the best gift of all.

lenders.name: Moïra
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are able to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and French in a high school.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: To enable people to work and feed themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Achieve targets

lenders.name: Leann
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of my help making it possible for someone to create something positive and change their lives, and their communities.  Although I live in the over-privileged America, I recognize  money is NOT what makes the world go 'round.  It's people and their dreams, and I like knowing I can help make a difference and do something important.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to change the world for the betterment of all mankind.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a film director.

lenders.name: Sondra and Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I understand that some people just need a little help to get things going. It's nice to be able to reach out to those motivated people who are trying to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Henrik Melander
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help foreign entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Works with computers to design and create telecom software.

lenders.name: AMANDA
lenders.occupation: Member Services Representative for Credit Union

lenders.name: Kwali Media and Associates
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, whilst keeping others in mind, that have less. We are lucky people
lenders.occupational_info: Kwali Media and Associates record audio for film and television. We edit and produce music for media use.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: I want my 2 sons to learn the importance of small family businesses, and how they are the cornerstones of all communities around the world. We hope that our contributions are welcomed and smartly invested.
lenders.occupational_info: Business consultant for overseas companies requiring sales and marketing related help in North-America.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Helping these people to earn a living and connecting with other people in the world is a better return than I can get anywhere else.

lenders.name: Encounter Service Camp
lenders.loan_because: Encounter the Gospel of Life is a youth service camp that desires to reach out and connect with our global community.  We work with high school youth from the Washington DC, Baltimore, Boston, New York and Pennsylvania areas and strive to work with them and show them how they can also connect with people around the world through micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
EGL is a Catholic Service Camp.

To learn more about us, visit our website or follow us on facebook (Encounter Service Camp):

www.eglweb.org

lenders.name: Eldo
lenders.loan_because: I believe we must all help each other.  I came to this country as an immigrant and with hard work and the help of many loving people, I learned the language and became a successful businessman.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time as I am retired and I love to cook and spend time with friends and Italian cultural organizations.  I especially love being with my family.

lenders.name: Nicky & Ramon
lenders.loan_because: We loan because the Kiva Project makes sense. We don't have much money but are willing to share with people who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: Nicky produces and edits video programs. I'm a retired, disabled cartoonist -- can't draw anymore, so I write Micro fiction (under 500 words) stories.

lenders.name: Lee and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Because we can and should!!

lenders.name: P & S
lenders.loan_because: it is a no brainer.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: Music and movements

lenders.name: Troutsfarm
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Shellie
lenders.loan_because:
* It feels good
* I'm grateful to have the opportunity to share
* It's easy (thanks Kiva!)
lenders.occupational_info: I love to travel and meet new people.  Travel is the best way to remember that 'we are all one', and we all ultimately want the same things:  food, water, shelter, love, joy.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help others become self-sufficient, and in turn help their families and communities.

lenders.name: Brooks
lenders.loan_because: i know i can make a difference and have been given so much.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom with a good job and I think it's important to help other moms.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Geotechnical Consulting firm in No. California.

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: all the cool kids are doing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I send marketing emails about skin products.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: To offset an unjust and unequal system which benefits from keeping people impoverished, I am happy to contribute to the growth and financial maturing of the developing world. It is a way to equalize and reform capitalism without dismantling it, which I believe is the best approach to helping people build wealth. It’s a subversive and direct yet delicate approach to creating a world where opportunity is not reserved for those born into it.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 6th grade student who plays soccer.

lenders.name: Eulalia
lenders.loan_because: We have so much here in the U.S. - everyone ought to realize how lucky they are and give to someone who's less fortunate and trying to improve their lives!
lenders.occupational_info: I write website content, brochures, and marketing materials for small to medium sized businesses.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I live in the world, not just my small space. And I have a responsibility to help where I am able.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly grow vegetables from seeds I get from Italy. I do it because its different and challenges my ability.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to lend money that doesn't just feed a person or family for a day but sets them up for a lifetime of supporting themselves.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: a small gesture repeated by many people can make a huge difference where it's really needed.

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.occupational_info: ingeniero ambiental.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Helping eachother is the right thing to do.  I hope my kids will learn it's not what you have but what you give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an internet entreprenuer. I buy at yard sales and sell my finds on the internet.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: There are many who have the drive to be successful and self-sufficient but they just need a helping hand at the start.

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: it's a way for a young person to do something helpful in the world.

lenders.name: ocean lover
lenders.loan_because: This is something that I can do in MY income bracket!
lenders.occupational_info: Venture Capital

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe people can improve their lives by self-direction, not by just doing what someone else tells them to do.  Kiva seems to make that possible.
lenders.occupational_info: As a lawyer, I help people and businesses to succeed; as a musician, I bring joy through music into my life and the lives of others

lenders.name: John and Shannon
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired now, but John was a businessman, and Shannon was a teacher. Shannon still teaches a college writing course occasionally.
